name: WarrenPeace
address: 77 Warren St, New York, NY 10007, USA

reviews.text: Great drinks, no fuss
Loved our drinks and the vibe at Warren Peace. Chill cocktail lounge meets tasty cocktails and more. Great place to kick off the evening or hang with friends over drinks.

Had a great experience at Warren Peace! Delicious and strong cocktails (we had Man with no name, Chaibeca, and Shapeshifter), friendly staff, and chill cocktail lounge vibes. Would highly recommend for a drink (or two or three) out in the city. Pistachio Cr√®me Br√ªl√©e was delicious too. Didn‚Äôt have any other food but everything on the menu looked tasty. Extra points for the Albanian derived menu!
Such a fun vibe, great drinks and food
The BEST duck fat fries!!! The service was incredible! We will be back!
The service was lovely and very friendly! We loved the Balkan breakfast and short fuse and really liked them. They are the perfect dessert drink.

Seems like a new cocktail bar that had just opened where the old 77 Warren used to be. I was visiting a friend in the neighborhood and decided to check it out. The place has a great vibe and offers Mediterranean fare.  We sat by the bar and‚Ä¶
Wish I had food here, just drinks and were wonderful. Really nice servers, crowded on Thursday at 9p. Loved it
Great drinks, so unique! Justin was the best, gave us the rundown, pointed us to the drinks that would fit our tastes!
Gorgeous ambience! The qofta was so fresh and fast! Ray was the most attentive waiter. Perfect place for a catch up
Amazing selection of spirits and liquors, the vibe is amazing, beautiful spot. Angelo was amazing at the bar, so friendly and professional. Totally recommended.

Solid food, good drinks, just a few missteps that means 4 not 5 stars.

Had an enjoyable experience here ‚Äì very nice atmosphere and good service but the food slightly missed the mark. As it is a small menu, it all needs to be perfect.

The first miss was the scampi pasta being unavailable - pretty poor when there are only 5 mains on the menu. The second was the lobster croquets are all potato and zero lobster. The crab cakes were pretty good.

The burger was good, but the waffle fries were under cooked. My steak ordered rare was mostly medium.

Overall a nice place but the food needs work. If you are going to offer a small menu, make sure you do everything perfectly.
Good vibes and great service. I‚Äôll be back for sure.
Great staff! Very Friendly! Very original cocktails.
Best fries in the neighborhood!
Such a perfect stop for a drink on our walk! The place has great ambiance and design. The drinks were delicious! Duck fat garlic fries were really good. Recommend!!
We loved our experience here! The duck fat fries were our favorite. Fabulous atmosphere and excellent service!
Great service, delicious food, cute ambience.
Great place, good drinks
Very cute bar and good cocktails but the food was so disappointing. So expensive for the food for what it is‚Ä¶
Bri was lovely and went the extra mile to make sure I was enjoying my meal! Love Bri! Food delicious!
We love Bri!
Wonderful service, great food, amazing drinks! I live in the area and this is our new hot spot.

This is my new favorite spot! I went here with my bf and the food was sooo good. The cherry on top was how sweet the server was. He‚Äôs so kind and friendly and gave us all free shots! Highly recommend
Hidden gem in the NYC scene. Would highly recommend. Service is fantastic.
it‚Äôs goad. Drinks and food were also goad. Must try.
what an amazing place! We walked in without a reservation and they accommodated us! we had appetizers and drinks, gluten free friendly food too!
Delicious drinks, great food, great service and great ambiance.
Great spot, great service, great times!
I would die for Brie. Her service was warm, thorough, beyond friendly; a perfect representative for the bar.

Fantastic service and cocktails! The duck fat fries are out of this world and the space is well decorated with tvs playing black and white classic movies/cartoons. Could have easily spent hours hanging out here!
Great service.
Great drinks and food, staff are super nice and helpful and the decorations and ambiance are great!
Great atmosphere! Amazing cocktails, apps and food. I HIGHLY recommend
Pisco drink was amazing!! Service amazing. Just came for a drink and now I will be back!
Nice bar - great service, good drinks, fries from heaven!  ‚ò∫Ô∏è
Best bar in Tribeca! Take my word for it - don‚Äôt miss the duck fat fries!
Fantastic cocktails and food -- and the vibes are immaculate! Beautiful decor and great service.

Attended an event with 30 to 40 people, excellent everything, including attentive, service, lamb sliders, beautiful steaks, outstanding duck fat fries, other food, lots of cocktails and well drinks. The place Has an impossiblely perfect vibe and couldn‚Äôt have been more accommodating. I‚Äôve been there before and this time they outdid themselves - i know they earned lots of repeat business last night!

This place is is so cozy and quaint. It‚Äôs great for dates, small parties and work gatherings. It doesn‚Äôt hurt that the food is delicious and the drinks are unique. It‚Äôs definitely my new go-to spot!
Amazing spot! The service was warm and attentive, the cocktails were creative and delicious, and the food was surprisingly good. A perfect place to unwind. Highly recommend!
Whoever said the waiter is dismissive is absolutely right. Don‚Äôt even bother coming or waiting.
Do the bartenders make the drinks with their feet? It‚Äôs so bad.

The place was very nice and the service was excellent but sometimes people do too much with the cocktail list and sadly this was the case. Some mix of modern cocktails and a fresh take on the classics would be nice.
The ambiance here is great. The cocktails are always solid and they have a nice variety. The food is ok depending on what you order.
Teleio magazi, ta piata tous itan apo ta kalytera pou exw dokimazei stin NY. Synistw poli to beef steak apo ta fagita, episeis ta koktail itan fantastika!!
Loved everything! The food was delicious‚Äîespecially the cocktails and the service was warm and attentive. Great atmosphere. Can‚Äôt wait to go back!
Super cute new spot in Tribeca. Highly recommend the steak. Lovely chef and friendly service.

Cool bar, good vibes, delicious drinks and friendly service. Great overall bar. Didnt try any of the food but it sounded good as well. There are some good happy hour prices...drinks are a little expensive in normal hours. Was pretty empty on a Tuesday but imagine it's busier on a weekend. Would definitely go back again.
Idk our waiters name but he was a older gentleman with glasses. He was extremely attentive and friendly. My friends and I enjoyed our time here !

Was on my bucket list and finally had the chance of stopping by. We ordered a bottle of red and some taziki spread which was great! The sidewalk is wide enough that you aren‚Äôt cramped in the outside tables. The staff were friendly and it was a pleasant vibe. We didn‚Äôt try the cocktails so definitely coming back for them!

Such a fun atmosphere post a visit to the mysterious bookstore. We were the only table at 3:30 on a Saturday, but the tables filled up quickly. I deducted a point, as we needed to flag for water several times. But overall fun!

Stopped by at WarrenPeace to grab a drink. The place has a 1920s vibe in terms of decor and you will definitely find yourself eyeing the walls. We had Alphonse and Missing Ear for drinks, they were both pretty good.
Great place to enjoy a cocktail and watch silent films instead of sports.

Amazing staff, delicious food, great cocktails. 10/10 experience. This is our second time coming, will come again. Rei was our server, he was amazing. Very on top of service, constantly checking in with us. I recommend the black and blue burger and the panna cotta dessert! Amazing!
A cute little place to grab a small bite to eat. Attentive staff overall with lovely cocktails.  As the bathroom says like 9 times: ONLY FLUSH TOILET PAPER!

This place was so cute inside. It had a lot of quirky decorations and was almost like a speakeasy vibe. The food was good too and we got Mocktails that all tasted great. The dishes were pretty creative too.
Amazing happy hour and cool vibes ‚Äî definitely a hidden gem with awesome service and drinks in Tribeca.

A group of us stopped in at WarrenPeace for drinks before dinner. This is such an incredible spot. The vibe and feel inside is warm and perfect to enjoy a conversation. Our server was super friendly. Everyone in our group enjoyed their drinks. And the duck fat fries were spot on! I highly recommend you stopping in at WarrenPeace.

It‚Äôs sad really, to write this review. We are New Yorkers but got the frosty ‚ÄúUgh, tourists‚Äù vibe from our server from the get go. We weren‚Äôt told about any specials or their happy hour. Being busy parents who had an hour of freedom, we were looking forward to a friendlier place with a nice vibe. The ambiance is nice- we liked the lighting and furniture. However, our server never checked in or asked how we were doing. We were sat in front of big vats storing multiple wine bottles so that wasn‚Äôt ideal. I wish I could say I‚Äôd return. Service is everything.
The place is so cool, food and drinks are amazing! Everything is perfect. The waitress was very nice, we will  be back for sure  :)

Came in for some before dinner drinks and enjoyed it so much we were almost late for our reservation. Four of us at the bar; got to engage in conversation with Charlotte (the bartender) and it made for a truly enjoyable experience, her recommendations based upon what we said we liked were spot on. The bar itself has the right vibe, the atmosphere is everything you want in a bar to hang out in and get a great cocktail.

A MUST STOP! Don‚Äôt underestimate this new spot in TriBeCa. Every aspect of Warren Peace is intentional - from the interior design to the divine menu to the specialty crafted drinks, every time I‚Äôve come here has been phenomenal.

FOOD: The chef has put together a menu full of absolute masterpieces. My personal recommendation: the Cassoulet with Duck Confit AND the Duck Fat Parm-Garlic Fries. Pro-tip is to dip the fries IN the cassoulet. You will not regret it.

DRINK: As mentioned, each drink is hand crafted. The head bartender clearly puts effort into the cocktails. I would highly recommend the Choco Old Fashioned (the bourbon is infused with cacao nibs), the Warren Negroni and the La Vie en Rose. But honestly, you can‚Äôt go wrong with anything behind the bar.

Selfishly I want this hidden gem to stay hidden, but the world deserves to know that Warren Peace is the place to be.

This is my new go to place in the city. It has that intimate, high-quality feeling to it. Feels like it has a secret, and I like it üòã The fact is, though, that quality IS high. Their chief is super talented, I haven‚Äôt had such great food in a long time. That steak!! I am telling you - the calamari salad, steak entree and that beautiful pistachio br√ªl√©e at the end - you won‚Äôt be wrong with that. The head bartender, Lucas, really know his mixology - all of the cocktails on the list are tasty, I especially liked their chocolate bitters Old Fashioned, Last Word (herbaceous classic) and Sticky Lips. Come here with a date and you‚Äôll feel like atmosphere is doing everything for you ;)

I have been here‚Ä¶ so many times and I will die on this hill. Order the black & blue burger, mid-rare, as it‚Äôs intended, with any of the killer cocktails and you will be sitting enjoying one of the best meals you can get in NYC. Killer. Would give more stars if I could. (Apologies for the half eaten, half drank photo, it‚Äôs one of those places where phone does not ‚Äúeat‚Äùfirst)
Great ambience, 1920s/30s themed decor but more upbeat than speakeasy. Great music. Food was spectacular. Drinks great and affordable, esp HH. I‚Äôll be back.

Beer selection appears to be bottles only, but you're here for the food and the cocktails so it doesn't really matter.
As for the food, everyone in our party ordered different items, and everyone was blown away. Duck confit, the most beautiful medium rare burger I have seen, tuna seared to perfection and a very tasty F√´rges√´, finished by a very nice creme brulee. Portions may be smaller than you're used to in the US, but very nice to walk out of a place satisfied but not dying for once on this trip.

Warm, interestingly decorated space with several tables in the front and a L-shaped bar in the back with ample seating. The cocktail list offers many options between house signatures and classics.  I was able to snag a bar seat on Friday‚Ä¶

WarrenPeace is a very nice cocktail bar. Their menu is solid and the staff are all great. It was pretty popular for a Thursday happy hour, so reservations are probably a good idea here. They have a few outdoor tables during the summertime, but the vibes are best on the inside (Charlie Chaplin on a TV, old timey feel).
Top tier cocktail bar with pleasant knowledgeable staff and patrons from largely around the financial district. Still feels cozy and a bit of a speakeasy vibe. Professionally made beverages.

Good cocktails in a fun, eclectic and moody environment. The food was good as well, check out the menu before you go as it is a smaller, specific menu. We both enjoyed it, but check to see if it‚Äôs something your hungry heart desires. Atmosphere was top notch, service was excellent, will be going back.
Consistently delicious with great service. Lobster croquette and burger were perfectly cooked and tzatziki and hummus are must-orders. Atmosphere is great for dates or small groups.

Very cute cocktail bar that we stumbled upon after dinner. They had a vibe selection of drinks to choose from with pretty much an option for anyone. The inside has a cozy vibe and the service is great. Would highly recommend stopping by because we‚Äôre looking forward to our next time back!

Super cute space. Feels like a secret speakeasy. Great find! An inebriated woman walked in while I was there and asked for tequila on the rocks, and the waiter said the management refused to serve her alcohol, but they were happy to offer her food. That kind of a respectable place! Music wasn‚Äôt too loud. Red lighting very cool.
The staff here was exceptionally kind (even with me coming in right before closing time), and the cocktails were perfect. Fantastic aesthetic, can‚Äôt recommend this place enough.

I recently visited Warren peace and was thoroughly impressed by the entire experience, from the warm welcome to the final farewell. This place truly knows how to combine ambiance, service, and quality offerings into a memorable night out.

Stopped by here while my family was visiting. Really great ambiance, super cozy inside. Servers were attentive and kind. We originally came just to have a few drinks - they were delicious, but we ended up getting some food too, which was also great. Omg the cr√®me br√ªl√©e was amazing!
